Name: Munich Negroni Western Style
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice & square of dark chocolate.
Review: A nutty riff on a Negroni with a lingering bittersweet hazelnut finish. The dark (high cocoa content) chocolate and orange slice garnish brilliantly befits this cocktail.
History: Created in 2015 by Mauro Mahjoub at his Negroni Bar in Munich, Germany. Negroni cocktail history and recipe variations
